GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
net: ethernet: bgmac: Fix refcount leak in bcma_mdio_mii_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit b51996e35bbfcc7a27d94dfeed5cc2429b2c0df4, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 55954f3bfdacc5908515b0c306cea23e77fab740. For more details please see the references link.
